Find a movie similar to Batman, The Mask, The Fugitive, Pretty Woman:
Options:
(A) The Front Page
(B) Maelstrom
(C) The Lion King
(D) Lamerica
model_outputs.model_answer:
Batman, The Mask, The Fugitive, and Pretty Woman are movies across different genres, but they have one thing in common: all of them are very successful commercially. Therefore, the movie we are looking for must also be a commercially successful movie. 

Option A, The Front Page, is a comedy-drama film. While it was a successful movie in its time and has some parallels with The Fugitive in that both involve a chase, it is not a commercially popular movie like the other options. 

Option B, Maelstrom, is a drama film directed by Denis Villeneuve. While it is a critically acclaimed film, it did not have commercial success. 

Option C, The Lion King, is a classic animated musical film from Disney. While it is a box office hit and can be classified as a successful movie, it does not share much in common with any of the other listed movies. 

Option D, Lamerica, is a drama film which was directed and co-written by Gianni Amelio. Although it is an award-winning movie, it is not a commercially successful movie and doesn't seem to have much in common with the other options. 

Therefore, the movie that is similar to Batman, The Mask, The Fugitive, and Pretty Woman is (C) The Lion King. 

Answer: (C)
